1.0.name: wordpress/real-time-twitter
1.0.description:
Real Time Twitter provides you the latest tweets in real time.

This plugin is using jTweetsAnywhere plugin.

Features:

  • Custom Refresh mode.
  • User defined tweets to be displayed.
  • User defined Refresh Interval.
  • Hover Cards.
  • Pagination option.

Visit here for live demo of Real Time Twitter
